title: San Jose Shooting Leaves at Least Nine Dead, Including Gunman
sub_head: Suspected shooter was an employee of the Valley Transportation Authority; bomb squad on scene
body:
SAN JOSE, Calif.—At least eight people were killed in a mass shooting at a light-rail facility in this Bay Area city’s downtown Wednesday morning, according to local law enforcement.
The shooter also died, according to Santa Clara County Sheriff Laurie Smith, in an apparent suicide. He and at least some of the dead were employees of the Valley Transportation Authority, which runs the facility, law- enforcement officials said.
One victim was in critical condition at the Santa Clara Valley Medical Center, according to a spokeswoman for the hospital.
A bomb squad was on scene Wednesday searching for explosive devices in the building where the shooting occurred, Sheriff’s Department Spokesman Russell Davis said.
“We’re trying to clear out every room and every crevice of that building,” he said.
